title: Saba Announces U.S. Tour
description: The Chicago rapper will support From the Private Collection of Saba and No ID with a string of June concerts
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: The Chicago rapper will support From the Private Collection of Saba and No ID with a string of June concerts
text: Fresh off the release of a new album, Saba has announced a tour. The Chicago rapper will hit the road for his Big Picture Tour in June. The trek includes a stop at Lyrical Lemonade Summer Smash. See Saba’s tour dates, featuring support from Ovrkast., below.Saba and producer No ID recently released their long-teased album From the Private Collection of Saba and No ID. It marked Saba’s first project since 2022’s Few Good Things.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
Fresh off the release of a new album, Saba has announced a tour. The Chicago rapper will hit the road for his Big Picture Tour in June. The trek includes a stop at Lyrical Lemonade Summer Smash. See Saba’s tour dates, featuring support from Ovrkast., below.

Saba and producer No ID recently released their long-teased album From the Private Collection of Saba and No ID. It marked Saba’s first project since 2022’s Few Good Things.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Saba: The Big Picture Tour

Saba:

06-07 Dallas, TX - The Echo Lounge & Music Hall *
06-08 Austin, TX - Empire Garage *
06-10 Atlanta, GA - Masquerade - Heaven Stage *
06-11 Charlotte, NC - The Underground *
06-13 Silver Spring, MD - The Fillmore Silver Spring *
06-14 Philadelphia, PA - Union Transfer *
06-15 Boston, MA - Royale *
06-17 New York, NY - Sony Hall *
06-19 St. Louis, MO - Delmar Hall
06-20 Indianapolis, IN - The Vogue
06-22 Bridgeview, IL - SeatGeek Stadium
06-25 Denver, CO - Cervantes Masterpiece Ballroom *
06-27 Phoenix, AZ - The Van Buren *
06-28 Los Angeles, CA - The Bellwether *

* with Ovrkast.
